channel.title: SFoL 28 - Grand...ish Idea! - Blue Dragon (except Memesky), Dreaming God and Foolsochist Victory!
channel.description:
## [color=gold]Welcome to Special Forum of Lies 28![/color] # [color=gold]Grand...ish Idea! [/color] <small>Hosted by Marluxion and @Ashe </small>
### [color=gold] Rules [/color]
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### [color=gold] Gameplay [/color] Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Scum Faction will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grand-idea-mafia-fol-edition/1488) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### [color=gold] Executions [/color] To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once majority is reached to accuse someone, a trial will begin. Either after 24 hours or once a trial reaches majority on pardon/execute, the trial will end. After the trial ends, the King has 12 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed Executions end the Day
# [color=gold]What's Grand...ish Idea?[/color] All Classes will be rolled from [this special class card thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grand-idea-mafia-fol-edition/1488). These classes are all made by users on this forum! Unlike normal Grand Idea FOL, however, there will be a balanced number of neutrals/blue dragon/scum. This is to prevent the game from ending on d1. If I deem a class too broken, i may reroll it.
### [color=gold] Journals [/color] Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### [color=gold] To Join[/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
# [color=gold]Players: [/color] 1. [color=red]**PoisonedSquid**[/color] - [color=grey]**Foolsochist (Alternate)**[/color] 2. [color=red]**MaximusPrime**[/color] - [color=purple]**Assassin**[/color] 3. [color=red]**Pug**[/color] - [color=steblue]**Hippolytus**[/color] 4. [color=red]**CheesyKnives**[/color] - [color=steblue]**Shapeshifter**[/color] 5. [color=red]**Hippolytus**[/color] - [color=steblue]**Investigator**[/color] 6. Damafaud 7. [color=red]**Rogue**[/color] - [color=purple]**AsheAssin**[/color] 8. [color=red]**Memesky** :crown: [/color] - [color=steblue]**Terrible King**[/color] 9. [color=red]**Whammerist**[/color] - [color=steblue]**Drunk**[/color] 10. [color=red]**Boss110**[/color] - [color=steblue]**MaximusPrime**[/color] 11. [color=red]**Techwolves**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The guy who doesn't perform well under pressure**[/color] 12. [color=red]**NuclearBurrito**[/color] - [color=beige]**Espeon**[/color] 13. [color=red]**Margaret**[/color] - [color=grey]**Poison Master**[/color] 14. Sarun 15. Frostwolf103 16. [color=red]**htm**[/color] - [color=purple]**Shrek 5**[/color] 17. [color=red]**Firekitten**[/color] - [color=steblue]**Uzu Sugena**[/color] 18. Blizer 19. Sam17z 20. Munstrish 21. [color=red]**Simon**[/color] - [color=steblue]**Poet**[/color] 22. [color=red]**eevee**[/color] - [color=beige]**Sylveon**[/color] 23. [color=red]**Marcus_Doodalee**[/color] - [color=purple]**AsheAssin**[/color] 24. [color=red]**Icibalus**[/color] - [color=steblue]**Ponce de Leon**[/color] 25. [color=red]**Solic**[/color] - [color=beige]**Leafeon**[/color] 26. [color=red]**psychoneirik**[/color] - [color=grey]**Tyrant Prince**[/color] 27. [color=red]**LightEthos**[/color] - [color=steblue]**#1 Gamethrowing Class**[/color] 28. [color=red]**MTheJoker**[/color] - [color=steblue]**Apprentice**[/color] 29. [color=red]**Shurian**[/color] - [color=steblue]**Miu Iruma**[/color] 30. [color=red]**Captain**[/color] - [color=grey]**Alchemist**[/color] 31. [color=red]**Livicus**[/color] - [color=steblue]**Good King**[/color] 32. [color=red]**Insanity**[/color] - [color=grey]**Pokemon Trainer**[/color] # [color=gold]Shortcuts[/color] :chains: [**Start of Game** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-28-grand-ish-idea-day-1-32-32-alive-foolish-mortals/69019/265) [**Start of D2**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-28-grand-ish-idea-day-2-25-32-alive-send-help/69019/3800?u=marluxion) [**Livicus reveals to be an Innocent Child** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-28-grand-ish-idea-day-2-25-32-alive-send-help/69019/3809?u=marluxion) [**Start of D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-28-grand-ish-idea-day-3-21-32-alive-send-help/69019/4459?u=marluxion) [**Start of D4**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-28-grand-ish-idea-day-4-14-32-alive-foolsochist-fever/69019/5389?u=marluxion) [**Start of D5** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-28-grand-ish-idea-day-5-9-32-alive-oh-this/69019/6270?u=marluxion)

item.description:
Out of curiosity, what would you have done if you jailed me instead of FK and I had claimed NH?

I was planning to attempt to strike a deal with you and ask you to help me rid of Neut King Memesky and I’d would have voted for you as King if you stepped up.

Read full topic
